familyMemberEthics.description: Ivanka Trump served as President, Secretary, Treasurer of 502 6G LLC from Nov 1, 2015, until May 1, 2017. Ivanka Trump received $100,001 - $1,000,000 in Rent or Royalties income from 502 6G LLC (Residential Real Estate in New York, NY) the year before her appointment as her father's presidential adviser. Although the positions are resigned, there is no indication her interest in this entity has been divested or placed into a blind trust; therefore, it is marked in this database as an active potential conflict of interest.
familyMemberEthics.business: 502 6G LLC (Residential Real Estate In New York, NY)

familyMemberEthics.description: Jared Kushner received $100,001 - $1,000,000 in Rent or Royalties income from 502 6G LLC (Residential Real Estate in New York, NY) the year before his appointment as Pres. Trump's senior adviser.
familyMemberEthics.business: 502 6G LLC (Residential Real Estate In New York, NY)
